title: installation database setup texts: add unambiguous information, what is meant by database username and database password
body: this issue is intentionally filed in owncloud/core , and not in /documentation. the input fields during the installation are unclear (ambiguous), because it is not clear whether the **root** username and **root** password needs to be entered: i suggest to change * database user and password to * database **root** user and database **root** password or something else which are valid database user and password strings at this stage, see https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/6194#issuecomment-30167370 . https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/6194#issuecomment-30167370 suggests, that as an alternative to root username and root password something else could be entered, but from the current input label texts it is not clear (to someone unaware of the documentation) what exactly has to be entered.
